extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for Buffer, etc.

    • 方法详细资料

      • emptyBuffer

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer emptyBuffer()
        Returns an empty byte buffer.
        返回:
        an empty byte buffer

      • getBytes

        public static byte[] getBytes(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Read all bytes of given buffer into a new byte array and return. After reading, the buffer's position will be updated to its limit, its limit will not have been changed.
        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        返回:
        read bytes array

      • getBytes

        public static byte[] getBytes(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                              int number)
        Reads bytes of specified number from given buffer. If the number is greater than remaining of buffer, it will only read the remaining bytes. After reading, the buffer's position will be updated to (position + number) or its limit, its limit will not have been changed.
        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        number - specified number
        返回:
        bytes of specified limit number from given buffer

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer)
        Read all bytes of given buffer and encodes to string with FsChars.defaultCharset(). After reading, the buffer's position will be updated to its limit, its limit will not have been changed.
        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        返回:
        read string

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                         java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Read all bytes of given buffer and encodes to string with given charset. After reading, the buffer's position will be updated to its limit, its limit will not have been changed.
        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        charset - given charset
        返回:
        read string

      • slice

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer slice(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                        int limit)
        Returns slice of given buffer by ByteBuffer.slice(), and set new buffer's limit to given limit.
        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        limit - given limit
        返回:
        sliced buffer

      • subView

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer subView(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                          int offset)
        Returns a sub-range view of given buffer, start from given offset to limit. The two buffers will share the same data so any operation will reflect each other.

        Note the offset is start from 0 not current position.

        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        offset - given offset
        返回:
        the sub-buffer

      • subView

        public static java.nio.ByteBuffer subView(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                          int offset,
                                          int length)
        Returns a sub-range view of given buffer, start from given offset to specified length. The two buffers will share the same data so any operation will reflect each other.

        Note the offset is start from 0 not current position.

        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        offset - given offset
        length - specified length
        返回:
        the sub-buffer

      • splitInLength

        public static java.util.List<java.nio.ByteBuffer> splitInLength(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                                                int length)
        Reads and split given buffer in fixed length. This method will move buffer's position by reading. If the remaining length of buffer is not enough to split, the buffer's position will be reset to last start position. This method use ByteBuffer.allocate(int) to create new buffer, then put data into the new buffer from given buffer.

        Each returned buffer's position is 0, limit and capacity is the length.

        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        length - fixed length
        返回:
        split buffers

      • splitInLength

        public static java.util.List<java.nio.ByteBuffer> splitInLength(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                                                int length,
                                                                java.util.function.IntFunction<java.nio.ByteBuffer> generator)
        Reads and split given buffer in fixed length. This method will move buffer's position by reading. If the remaining length of buffer is not enough to split, the buffer's position will be reset to last start position. This method use given buffer generator to create new buffer, then put data into the new buffer from given buffer.

        Each returned buffer's position is 0, limit and capacity is the length.

        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        length - fixed length
        generator - given buffer generator, the function arguments is capacity
        返回:
        split buffers

      • splitInLength

        public static java.util.List<java.nio.ByteBuffer> splitInLength(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                                                int lengthOffset,
                                                                int lengthSize)
        Reads and split given buffer in specified length.

        The split length is specified at offset (lengthOffset) of buffer, and the lengthSize specifies width of lengthOffset (must in 1, 2, 4). The split length value must <= Integer.MAX_VALUE.

        This method will move buffer's position by reading. If the remaining length of buffer is not enough to split, the buffer's position will be reset to last start position.

        This method use ByteBuffer.allocate(int) to create new buffer, then put data into the new buffer from given buffer. Each returned buffer's position is 0, limit and capacity is the length.

        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        lengthOffset - offset of length
        lengthSize - length size must in 1, 2, 4
        返回:
        split buffers

      • splitInLength

        public static java.util.List<java.nio.ByteBuffer> splitInLength(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                                                int lengthOffset,
                                                                int lengthSize,
                                                                java.util.function.IntFunction<java.nio.ByteBuffer> generator)
        Reads and split given buffer in specified length.

        The split length is specified at offset (lengthOffset) of buffer, and the lengthSize specifies width of lengthOffset (must in 1, 2, 4). The split length value must <= Integer.MAX_VALUE.

        This method will move buffer's position by reading. If the remaining length of buffer is not enough to split, the buffer's position will be reset to last start position.

        This method use given buffer generator to create new buffer, then put data into the new buffer from given buffer. Each returned buffer's position is 0, limit and capacity is the length.

        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        lengthOffset - offset of length
        lengthSize - length size must in 1, 2, 4
        generator - given buffer generator, the function arguments is capacity
        返回:
        split buffers

      • splitByDelimiter

        public static java.util.List<java.nio.ByteBuffer> splitByDelimiter(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                                                   byte delimiter)
        Reads and split given buffer by specified delimiter. This method will move buffer's position by reading. If it meets a delimiter, a new buffer will be created by ByteBuffer.allocate(int), and data from start position or last delimiter pos + 1 (as start position) to current delimiter pos - 1 will be put into the new buffer. If no delimiter read and given buffer is read to the end, the buffer's position will be reset to last start position.

        For example: 

             splitByDelimiter("123|456|789|") = ["123", "456", "789"]
     splitByDelimiter("|123|456|789|") = ["", "123", "456", "789"]
     splitByDelimiter("|123|456|78") = ["", "123", "456"] and reset to position 9
        Each returned buffer's position is 0, limit and capacity is the length.
        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        delimiter - specified delimiter
        返回:
        split buffers

      • splitByDelimiter

        public static java.util.List<java.nio.ByteBuffer> splitByDelimiter(java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
                                                                   byte delimiter,
                                                                   java.util.function.IntFunction<java.nio.ByteBuffer> generator)
        Reads and split given buffer by specified delimiter. This method will move buffer's position by reading. If it meets a delimiter, a new buffer will be created by given buffer generator, and data from start position or last delimiter pos + 1 (as start position) to current delimiter pos - 1 will be put into the new buffer. If no delimiter read and given buffer is read to the end, the buffer's position will be reset to last start position.

        For example: 

             splitByDelimiter("123|456|789|") = ["123", "456", "789"]
     splitByDelimiter("|123|456|789|") = ["", "123", "456", "789"]
     splitByDelimiter("|123|456|78") = ["", "123", "456"] and reset to position 9
        Each returned buffer's position is 0, limit and capacity is the length.
        参数:
        buffer - given buffer
        delimiter - specified delimiter
        generator - given buffer generator, the function arguments is capacity
        返回:
        split buffers
